Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Bulls are playing at home, where they had a 20-21 record last season.
The Utah Jazz have struggled on the road, with a 10-31 record last season.
Lonzo Ball is out for the Chicago Bulls due to a wrist injury.
Several Utah Jazz players are also injured, including Lauri Markkanen, Taylor Hendricks, Jordan Clarkson, and Isaiah Collier.
